title: Nicola Sturgeon: Learning to drive will give me personal freedom
content: This video can not be playedNicola Sturgeon is in the early stages of learning to drive, she has told a new BBC podcast.The outgoing first minister says she did not make time to take lessons when she was younger as she was focused on politics.Now she hopes learning to drive will give her more "personal freedom". Hear more of the conversation by subscribing to the Nicola Sturgeon podcast on BBC Sounds <https://www.bbc.co.uk/sounds/brand/p0fbg2m8>. Episode 1: The Resignation is available from Monday 27 March.
